name: bugdom (itch)
description:
hi

this game is about a game I played when I was younger called bugdom. It came in a pack of games for the Mac, many of which I spent hours playing. More than that, this game touches on how I used games to let me escape from the troubles of real-world problems and get lost in another reality.

emulating bugdom was quite fun. especially modeling and texturing the squirrel, it was pretty fun to mess around and make something wonky/low-res on purpose. On the other hand, baking textures and just texturing stuff in general was a pain in the ass.
